website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable flip-flop with arch support.
pros: Sturdy flip-flops with a comfortable design
A solid flip-flop with an extra soft sole
Six colors and patterns to choose from
cons: Rubber logo in heel can be painful

customer_reviews.title: Great flip flop
customer_reviews.text: Nail polish is by my 5 year old and sold separately. I am open to inquires on foot modeling. I will book quickly based on these beauties. I wear a 13 in Nike, 12 in dress shoes so it can be difficult to order correct shoes. I needed a 13 in these. And they are by far the best flip flops I have owned. The support is great and I will re-order when they break down but going on a year and they're still good.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed in this bc this is one thing I looked ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits, its comfy...BUTTTT with any moisture or water the flip-flop gets unbearable and very slippery. I was very disappointed in this bc this is one thing I looked for in the comments and tried to research, but didn't see anything! I relied on the name brand and the type of company this is known for and expected the best... but nope... its sucks. And I don't always wanna wear the Teva Original Sandal, just wanted a comfy non-slip sandal. Disappointed. NOT GOOD FOR: The beach, the lake, the river, the pool, the after a shower walk to the bedroom, rain, standard foot moisture, and everyday use where getting wet or moisture is a possibility.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Olivares

customer_reviews.title: Always The Best
customer_reviews.text: Teva is the standard by which all other casual shoes are measured against. They are the most comfortable sandals and flip-flops on the market. The Mush II's last me about two years but I wear them all the time, into the fall and then again in mid-spring. No doubt Teva is proud of their product and therefore pricey, but I won't buy anything else. The quality is hands over so many other brands. You'll never go wrong with a pair of Tevas on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Really comfy flip flop with a pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: The surprise being that the logo at the heal of the flip flop is simply marked into the footbed, instead of a different material as shown. Probably more comfortable that way. The footbed is also really comfortable and the perfect balance of soft for comfort, but firm enough to provide support. The only reason for 1 less start is that the inside straps by the arch of your feet may get in the way. I.e. you step on them when walking. Though admittedly I haven't had flip flops in years and it may just need some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Mush II are the only sandals I wear!
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering these sandals for years. I am a big guy, 6'2" around 280 lbs, and these are the only sandals I will wear. When I lived in the Caribbean, they were a necessity and I have been hooked on them ever since! Word to the wise: I will never understand Amazon's pricing structure, but my advice would be to look around at the different styles in your size. Sometimes the same shoe will be a drastically different price in a slightly different color. Sometimes it pays to be a little less choosy!
customer_reviews.author: RoamingShopper

customer_reviews.title: A Comfortable and Good Looking Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I like these sandals more as I wear them. The middle piece that goes between your toes seemed a bit bulky and uncomfortable at first, but once I wore them a few times I stopped noticing until I took them off, which is where it does expand a bit. Still, the straps and comfortable and the bottom foam is very soft indeed. A good choice for footwear in the summer! I like the looks of these also, especially compared to my old rubber thongs, as we used to call them. Still use those around the pool though.
customer_reviews.author: Nails

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable flip flops ever
customer_reviews.text: My wife has always been a fan of these and I ended up taking a trip somewhere warm in winter so needed some new ones from online since the stores didn’t have them yet. These were the most comfortable flip flops that I have ever worn. I ended up buying a second for a different color and will continue to do so as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Tunk

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and don’t slip on wet pavement!!
customer_reviews.text: Update.. About 3 weeks of daily use and I LOVE THESE FLIP FLOPS! Really comfortable and each day I wear them they become even more comfortable! Definitely happy with purchase. I’m about 8 days in and I really like them. Definitely super comfy. Wore them in the rain and had no problems with slipping. Only thing I could say is They could be a little wider. I wouldn’t say they are necessarily skinny but they JUST fit width wise. I’ve bought others that are wider and prefer a little more width. That being said happy with purchase and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H.

customer_reviews.title: Trust me, this isn't a flop, you'll flip at how well these feel on your feet!
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable to wear -- they actually feel as if they offer support for your foot, which makes it so comfortable. The best part, the strap that goes between your big toe and index toe doesn't cause insufferable friction. The material is soft and not wide, so you don't have to worry about it ripping between your toes. I use 10/10.5 (depending on the shoe) and the 10 fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Strap snapped after just 7 months
customer_reviews.text: Normally love this brand of flip-flops, but this pair's strap broke much earlier than I'm used to. I wouldn't say I had worn them excessively or abused them in any way. I was just walking into a dentist's office and they broke. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: G-Lanz

customer_reviews.title: Real Tevas?
customer_reviews.text: I've had a couple pair of Tevas- and these just don't seem right. Quality is not completely there - these are not as "beefy" as usual, and the soles seem like they should not have made it past quality control, unless there was none - see pic of the sole. These also fit smaller than usual despite buying to upper size- I wear 10 to 10.5, so I bought 11. And they do not have the trademarked "mush" logo I saw in the amazon pics - see my pic. Then you start reading about all the loads of counterfeits confiscated at customs - wonder if these are part of one of those shipments.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Well made and do the job
customer_reviews.text: These are replacements for the Plam Island women's flip flops that are no longer made. I resorted to buying men's flip flops because they are better made, have a deeper / cushioned sole and I refuse to pay almost double for a women's flip-flop that doesn't cushion my feet, have cloth straps and isn't durable. These work. Maybe Teva will make some in tropical colors with a similar price point.
customer_reviews.author: Cadance Renene

customer_reviews.title: Best Flip Flops! 6 years of heavy use
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this same pair on Amazon 6 years ago. After 6 years, and almost daily wear in the summer (and 3 trips to Vegas and 2 to Disney), they were so worn on the bottom that I decided it was time for a new pair. Lightweight, affordable, comfortable, and (not sure if you are supposed to do this) but I wash mine in the washer and let them air dry.
customer_reviews.author: BenAmazon1991

customer_reviews.title: Awesome comfortable flip flops for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell how these hold up in the long run, but just wearing these for a few weeks they are the most comfortable flip flops I’ve ever worn. Very nice soft foam padding and also pretty decent grip on wet pavement compared to my other cheap flip flops. These things actually grip on concrete which has been a literal life saver. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley K.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality??
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t get much wear out of these as I live in Seattle, WA and they busted before I could get them to what I would consider, broken in. I expected these to last longer based on previous experience with Teva; perhaps my expectations are to high. Purchased in January of 2018, again very little use as I live in Seattle. Both straps recently pulled out of the soul, I’m glad I wasn’t on vacation as I have large feet and it’s difficult to find a flip-flop/shoe that fits. The souls are also very slippery when they get wet making it hard to keep them on tour feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: 9 or so months later...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great pair of sandals when I first purchased it. I'm still wearing them but over the course of the last two or three weeks, as the foam has compressed more. That isn't the issue. The black dye has started to rub off on my feet and nails. It is not rubbing off on the floor that I can tell and it is not turning less black. But it is definitely staining my feet/toes with black dye.
customer_reviews.author: Jason - Shoo

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Doesn’t fit right (one shoe is naturally “crooked”)
customer_reviews.text: I seems like the canvas strap on one of them is defective, as it naturally makes my foot crooked on only the left flip flop (my heel sticks out over the outside/left edge of the shoe slightly). This doesn’t happen on the right flip flop, nor does it happen in any other pair of flip flops I own. I think I will be purchasing a different brand since these clearly are not very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: tommy higgins

customer_reviews.title: Great for a single summer
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable ,flops. I buy 4-5 every summer and they last about 1 summer before wearing out (i.e., getting too compacted. The soles are not as durable as regular Teva sandals, and Teva does make a flip flop with a sturdier sole...but they are not as comfortable. You sacrifice durability for comfort, but the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: SSB

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty basic design, but very functional and comfortable. I've paid $60 + for flip flops that were no where near a comfy as these. The grip is excellent on the top and bottom, even when wet. Over the years I've owned several pairs of teva shoes and even with all the abuse I put them through they still hold up, I have no doubt these will be the same.
customer_reviews.author: Jahejema

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft, good replacement for old Tevas
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are essentially identical to my 4 yr old Tevas. The soles are the softer style, not the super stiff ones that are also available. I put these on, and threw the old pair in the garbage. MY feet are 8.5 US, these size 8 shoes fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ILKamazon

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For the price, great flip-flop. From a comfort perspective, I tend to wear these over my more expensive ones. They just feel good and are extremely light weight. Great for the beach!
customer_reviews.author: J.M. Myrick

customer_reviews.title: Good for the beach and just walking around
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flip flop for a trip to Punta Cana. I wore it all day at the resort and on the beach for four days and found it to be very comfortable. The foam is just the right level of "cushiness" and they stay on your feet even when wet. It seems very sturdy too. This will be my go to flip flop for the rest of the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Damman

customer_reviews.title: They don't last with daily wear.
customer_reviews.text: I've had two pairs of the Teva Mush II flip-flops now. Both have failed at about the three month mark. Both times a strap on the side has pulled out. I wear flip-flops daily about 8 months of the year. I've been through many different brands and none, outside of dollar throw-aways, have been as short lived as the Teva's. However, up until they fail they are very comfortable and light weight. Another reviewer mentioned their feet don't slip out when wet. My experience is the total opposite. I can't wear these around water, even when new they are very slippery when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect durable flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my middle school son. I refuse to get him the cheap pull though flip flops again after we took an unexpected hike and his flip flops broke and he did the majority of the hike barefoot. These shoes are great! They are comfortable and durable and just what you'd expect from Teva. (The only thing better would be if they came with a tracking device since he keeps losing them.) I'm sure he will outgrow these before he can destroy them which is actually a huge challenge.
customer_reviews.author: thinkC

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: They fit great and look great. Exactly as I expected and the second pair I've owned after loosing my first set on vacation. I REALLY hate flip flops that flop too much and you have to curl your toes to keep them on, these fit me perfectly and I love wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Inferior quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Teva Mush flip flops for my husband a few weeks ago and he is unhappy with them. He had bought a pair of Teva Mush flip flops several years ago, and enjoyed the way they fit. The new pair seems to be made more cheaply with a looser fit that causes the heels to drag each step. Also the thong between the toes chafes uncomfortably. The only reason I am not giving them one star is that the flip flops have not come apart yet. It looks like Teva decided to maintain its profits by manufacturing a cheaper flip flop and marketing under the name of the original Mush flip flop. Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but short life span
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, very comfortable and soft. only drawback is that they don't last long. The bottoms wear smooth and while the foam conforms to your feet very comfortably it also compresses very quickly to the point where they feel close to walking in bare feet. However for the price they're worth buying, I bought 2 pairs this summer and have worn them both out.
customer_reviews.author: Idlehands

customer_reviews.title: You will not regret this purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: These sandles made my fiance cry with tears of joy when he put these on his feet! They are comfortable, supportive, soft but not mushy. Im so happy. Im hoping I can get a discount on my future purchases cause we are now customers for life! Thank you TEVA!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Goodchild

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely Basic Flip Flops
customer_reviews.text: These flip flops are awesome. Super basic but does the job. My husband didn't want a flip flop with the neoprene underneath the strap. That was surprisingly hard to find! These don't have it, just a basic canvas strap. No arch support really, but they're flip flops. Work great, comfortable, lightweight and serve their intended purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last with minor wear. Broken strap.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were very comfortable but strap broke after only 2 months of random quarantine wear around the house. So sad as these were so comfortable. Not sturdy enough for extremely mild use:( We love Teva brand and found this very unusual.
customer_reviews.author: mindi mcnair

customer_reviews.text: Would give these 3.5 stars. How can you rate new shoes the day they are received? It's like stating that new car smells amazing. Check back w me in 4years, 5, 8. Then you can truly rate a product. But these will be basic no frills nothing special flops. Probably better than the Puma ones from Costco that blew out.
customer_reviews.author: Renaldo

customer_reviews.title: Nice cushioned sole but run a bit large
customer_reviews.text: Had teva sandals before myself and loved them so I was confident buying a pair for my husband when I saw it was available in his size (14). While he says he will wear the sandals, they are too big and the straps are loose, making it a bit challenging to keep them in his feet.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: They're nice enough to wear out to dinner and almost Sunday ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this brand/pair since around 2004. Usually buy two at a time for price. On a $25 MSRP I have never paid more than $19 and less than $13 on Amazon per pair. One pair for general use then it gets relegated to yard work and the cycle goes on. They're nice enough to wear out to dinner and almost Sunday mass. On heavy use averaging 6mos to well over a year per pair. It's the comfort that keeps me contiuing to buy versus paying $60+ for a good pair and hoping you get your money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: dca

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I just popped a strap on my favorite Sperry flip flops after a couple years, my favorites before those were Teva. I decided to flip flop back and these are quite adequate but I worry they may not last to my everyday use here near the beach. I say this because of how light weight they are but I may be surprised, otherwise they are comfy, stylish and I really like them. Delivered on time and as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Barrett - Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and have good arch support
customer_reviews.text: These are basic flip flops and are as I would expect for $20. They are comfortable and have good arch support. These flip flops get really loud and squeaky when wet, like everyone looks at you when you walk in loud. Also these flip flops do not have a rubber sole and can be a little more sloppy then I would like. That being said for $20 these sandals are still a good buy in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Great flip flops, my favorite pair yet
customer_reviews.text: The straps on these are even more comfortable that on my original Mush or Mush II flip flops. These run, IMO, a bit small. If you wear a half size normally I'd recommend taking the next size up. I wear a 9.5 shoe normally and size 10 in these fits just about perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Greg A.

customer_reviews.title: Another TEVA Mush
customer_reviews.text: I lost count of how many TEVA Mush I've went through. Its just so perfect for me. I have sent gifts to my old-fart friends with heel cracked foot. I even ordered through Amazon Japan, UK when Amazon.com was out... (sorry I only purchase directly from Amazon Prime)
customer_reviews.author: T.T.

customer_reviews.title: These flip flops are really good at taking the abuse of daily usage throughout SE ...
customer_reviews.text: These flip flops are really good at taking the abuse of daily usage throughout SE Asia. Through water, sand, and concrete they are holding up excellently. Two concerns: They are folding upwards. Not that big of a concern because they flatten out as you wear them. They are very slippery on marble, wet or dry. Be careful if it is on a slant as well, you will slip.
customer_reviews.author: bry g

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfortable, until the strap fell apart at six months of light usage. Try a different brand/model...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely mushy. Doesn't take long to create foot grooves. Slippery when wet. Unfortunately, they only lasted 6 months. The right side of the right shoe is hanging on by a thread. Bought for $18 - they are $25 + shipping on teva.com. If you are going to buy disposable flip flops, you're just as well off getting a no name brand. These are junk. They are also a big narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Sichol

customer_reviews.title: I like 'em a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I wear flip-flops as often as I can, daily. I prefer flip-flop to slide style. Having bought countless different brands over the years I find Teva's the most dependable for comfort and longevity(tread and tong wear). Also they seem much more slip resistant when wet than the $5 brands that should have a safety warning stamp.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace Sands

customer_reviews.title: My 8th Pair
customer_reviews.text: Have worn these flip flops for about 15 years - usually a pair lasts me about 2 years, but I still have them all to wear - they pretty much mold to your feet after wearing...living in the south, I can wear these close to year round..comfortable and durable...best flip flops out there...
customer_reviews.author: adumortier

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite, Great Arch Support too
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and look great . By far my favorite for comfort fit and durabilty. Im ordering another pair.
customer_reviews.author: jose quervo

customer_reviews.title: A little lose on the foot and one squeaks when wet.
customer_reviews.text: I find myself clenching my toes to make them stay on well because the webbing at the toe is a little too generous. When walking in wet conditions, one of them lets out a squeak like there is a hole pushing out water.
customer_reviews.author: donnie

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable yet have a harder sole at the bottom that ...
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a number of Teva flip flops over the years and keep going back for more. They are very comfortable yet have a harder sole at the bottom that keeps thorns or rocks or anything from poking through to your foot. I'm a fan!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Not your average flip flop. Your feet will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I used to think all flip flops were the same. This was before my wife introduced me to Tevas. These are so much more comfortable than your $5-10 flip flops. That said, they're still not shoes. I don't run, hike, etc. in these. For a trip to the beach, a walk to the mail box or chilling outside, they're perfect. I have a somewhat wide food (Nikes just don't fit me). I wear a 12, I ordered a 12. They're a little tight width wise but fit and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Well made flip flops
customer_reviews.text: They fit very well and have accompanied me on many trips to the beach. A well made, durable set of flip flops. Also they have survived many trips through the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Morris

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, Supportive, Right Size!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and good looking. I wanted a step up from really cheap thongs, but not too expensive. The soles are comfortable and supportive, they've adapted to my feet after just a few days wearing them, and the thick canvas straps look and feel great. At $25, I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wear these all day
customer_reviews.text: other flip flops start to grate on my feet after a while, but these are nice and soft and comfortable and they do what I want in any shoe: i don't notice i'm wearing them
customer_reviews.author: Winston Zedemore

customer_reviews.title: Great look but not durable
customer_reviews.text: For such a simple shoe one might expect something that would last. I use them when I take a shower and occasionally at night, they broke at the strap after one year of light indoor use ... so I for one am not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeromy Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: The Tevas pictured are not the ones sent...I have been wearing Teva's for 10 years and the ones pictured(the better Ones) have a raised logo under the heel...The ones received are a cheap knock off that dont have the raised logo, just an imprint...And they are of lesser quality and above all of lesser comfort... So take down the misleading pictures...
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a similar pair that I had completely worn out over the course of multiple years. They feel great, fit nicely, and do their job as flip-flops.
customer_reviews.author: Colby W

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Nice but seems to run a bit small.... I normally wear 12 but these were too small... reordered 13 and they are a tiny bit smaller than I would have expected but they are fine
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: My feet fell in love
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10.5 and ordered an 11. They are the perfect size for my foot. It is my understanding that these aren’t as “mushy” as their predecessor. Not having that prior knowledge is beneficial because these things feel amazing! I’d buy them again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Salty Prime

customer_reviews.title: Teva products have given up quality for cheaply made products
customer_reviews.text: This is thesecond Teva sandals that I have bought that fails to really have good support and uncomfortable to walk in. The first pair that I bought were fantastic! The current ones they have now are cheaply made and remind of the flip flops you can buy in Thailand and Vietnsm. Those from Southeasr Asia are far more comfortable than these cheap ly made Teva products you get now!
customer_reviews.author: bruce

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These flip-flops are practically indestructible. I had to buy this pair to replace another pair that were only 2 years old because my dog chewed off the heal. Otherwise, they last for years.
customer_reviews.author: E. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: First day felt perfect, week later not so much
customer_reviews.text: After wearing these for a couple weeks, I realize they are too cushy. I wish I would have known, could have returned them. Teva in the past were my goto sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Gene S.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Had these for one year, they were very comfortable but not at all durable. Straps on both sides pulled free in less then one year, there was so much tread left I decided to repair them with gorilla glue, worked great until the other side of the straps pulled free a few weeks later. If you’re looking for a comfortable one season sandal, look no further, if you you want some flips that’ll last a few years... keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: ashley hartley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable flip flops with great arch support
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my husband who lives them. Great arch support and comfort. Hard to find in stores. Amazon is the way to go to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, durable and stay on while walking and climbing stairs.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to similarly priced Abercrombie flip flops there is no comparison for my size 13/14 feet. The tevas look nicer, stay on better, and are more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: beanegrady

customer_reviews.title: Their ok
customer_reviews.text: Ok so far however they are not like the original ones I owned. Same serial # but previous ones were more soft while wearing & that was main reasons for getting them. New ones not soft, material feels hard for some reason. Maybe they need to be broken in more , but I want to say previous ones were super soft when purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect flip flop!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I love this brand. The color is darker than what it looks like in the picture but they are great in every other way. I have purchased multiple pairs of this brand of flip flops and they never disappoint! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: SDH Swift Draw Holsters

customer_reviews.title: Teva Sandals Rock!
customer_reviews.text: Teva rocks! Soooooo comfortable right out of the box. Love them. Had a pair, but my dog chewed them up. He loves Teva's too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Damaged too soon
customer_reviews.text: I've had good luck with their products in past, but this pair damaged within two months. There is a small, metallic needle protruding out of one of them and it's practically unusable now (and also past the return window)
customer_reviews.author: Ayush Shekhar Saxena

customer_reviews.title: Try them if you haven't already
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I only buy Tevas. They are super comfortable, especially once you break them in. He likes his a bit big. They are as good or better than sandals twice the price. Totally recommend. He bought them a size up, and they fit exactly how he wants. I buy mine true to size, and they fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Basic flip-flops that look good and last for miles and miles. It's the third pair I've bought, and hope that TEVA will continue to make this solid product.
customer_reviews.author: SailorsinFlorida

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a reasonable price!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the same Teva Men's 'flip flops' several months ago and very pleased with the quality and fit. These 'flip flops' have out lasted 2 other brand, so I recently ordered a spare set, I dislike shopping with a passion so when I find a supplier who offers prompt delivery and a manufacturer that provide a quality product at a reasonable price then, then I put them in my list of one stop shipping. .
customer_reviews.author: D. Engelson

customer_reviews.title: Another Teva Home Run !!
customer_reviews.text: The mush line of Teva Sandals slowly conform to the shape of your feet as you wear them - In a couple of weeks you'll almost forget you have them on. You can wash them by hand and air dry them overnight. They're inexpensive, durable, comfortable, lightweight, fit well, and I've never had a pair fail on me and I've worn some of them smooth on the outsole. In the summer months I wear them constantly, and they make good slip-on house shoes in the cooler months.
customer_reviews.author: ScorpioTgr

customer_reviews.title: Made me a flip flop convert
customer_reviews.text: I've never been one to wear flip flops a lot. My roommate convinced me to order a pair though, and I've been so glad that I did! These are very comfortable and I wear them every chance I get. As soon as I get home from work I put them on. I am also a person that likes to have quality goods. These do not feel like the cheap flip flops that I have seen at some stores. They feel like quality that will last
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky; runs small
customer_reviews.text: Squeaks when I walk on sidewalk; don’t like that. Fit a little snug. I wear 9.5, ordered 10, and seems still a little smaller than I’d like. Looks ok.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER

customer_reviews.title: Glue failure
customer_reviews.text: Had these for 2 months for mainly wearing to and from swim practice. The thong part popped out (glue failed) on one. Very disappointing. The comfort was decent, but they didn’t hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Meredyth L. Fogg

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, inexpensive sandals
customer_reviews.text: They are everything I expected in an inexpensive sandal. I know from experience that they will fit better and be more comfortable as they get broke in. (Not my first pair - my dog ate my last pair)
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ames

customer_reviews.title: bad, worse, worst
customer_reviews.text: They don't make flip flops like they used to, basically all if them the strap stretches, these straps have stretched, faded badly but also the footbed has so little density they collapse after only a month. Spines easily find their way to your feet...ouch!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These squeak louder than SpongeBobs boots when they get wet or sweaty. They have zero support and are like walking on mush.
customer_reviews.author: JD Fan

customer_reviews.title: Get the half size up
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. May want to size up a half size though. I normally wear a 10 in men’s but with these sandals my toes were almost to the edge. 10.5 works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Lonick

customer_reviews.title: Not really the MUSH II flip flops
customer_reviews.text: This was a different product and not what is pictured or what the item was supposed to be in the description or name. It was just another Teva flip flop.
customer_reviews.author: K.V.

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect to get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Teva has become garbage. You used to get what you paid for so that what I thought when I bought these. They dont Moisture wick at all. The rubber starts to wear away after a couple weeks of wearing them and makes your feet start to sweat which causes you to slip and slide in them like the cheap Old Navy sandals and have zero control. 64 degree night and my feet still sweat after 5 minutes. Proceeded to throw them in the garbage where they belong.
customer_reviews.author: Nick fox

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable pair of flip flops to wear around the house
customer_reviews.text: I use my Teva flip-flops mainly for indoor use inside the house. They are a perfect fit, light and super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: KapilS

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Love this ... have ordered it before more than once. Very comfortable ... light but great support. Delivered very quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: AAA

customer_reviews.title: My Go To Sandal... in fancy Canvas!
customer_reviews.text: I love Teva Mush Slippahs! I have at least two pairs at all times. The last approximately 18 months in Georgia Weather, 1 year in California Weather. I normally wear a men's size 8.5, women's 9.5D, and the size 8 is great. These canvas ones are super comfy, too!
customer_reviews.author: E. G. Renz

customer_reviews.title: Good flippers!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not thrilled with the fabric on top, however I love the foam foot bed! That’s why this is my second pair of this kind of flip flops. My first pair had a more durable top strap fabric, and lasted 7 years!!! The foam was well worn and super comfortable! They never broke! Just accidentally got left at my brothers house out west. Cost of shipping was the same as a new pair. So they are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: John Newby

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great long lasting product as walked on asphalt over 250 miles each season for last 5 years and finally wore out . size 15-16 is a little wide and long while the 14 is a little short . Wish they had size 15 by itself .
customer_reviews.author: Larry Mac

customer_reviews.title: Order 2 sizes larger
customer_reviews.text: I always order a size larger on sandals to give my toes and foot a little bumper from rocks and such. I wear a 9 and got a size 10 and I double checked the sandal's label. My pinkie toe was on the outside edge hanging over and the straps were so tight the sandals were hard to get on and off. I will reorder an 11 this time. My last 4 sandals have been Tevas
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flip flops
customer_reviews.text: These are my husband's favorite flip flops. He has several pairs. He says they're extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lola M

customer_reviews.title: Best comfortable daily usage.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using teva for almost 15 years and the comfort is second to non. Been using the exact models and size for years and the comfort doesn’t change at all, apart from a minor asthetics. Can’t say much about fitment since everyone foot is different. The only different is now im buying online because my local retail shop stop bringing them in.
customer_reviews.author: Ismail Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Great flip-flop
customer_reviews.text: These are great flip flops. Comfortable and look nice. Very happy with these. My wife has worn the women's versions of these for a few years. I needed a new pair and glad I chose these. Very satisfied and I'm not a flip flop guy. Usually never wear them away from the house and I've worn these a few times.
customer_reviews.author: D&B

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered (2) pairs of these flip flops based on the reviews, but they clearly missed quality control because the 1st pair broke after 1 week & the 2nd pair broke 2 days after we received them, super disappointed in this product from a well known brand and years of purchasing them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Van Der Hooven

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable flops
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. as someone that works on the beach most days of the week, these are my favorite flipflops
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: They had the Mush footbed and I absolutely loved them. I was so thrilled to see they ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of really old Teva sandals that these replaced. (At least 6 years old). They had the Mush footbed and I absolutely loved them. I was so thrilled to see they hadn't discontinued the Mush footbed I had to order a new pair. At first you think they're just another sandal, then after you wear them for a month or so, the footbed compresses and they feel like they mold to your feet. Then they become like a permanent memory foam and stay customized to your foot shape. I know I'll have these for years just like my old original Teva Mush sandals. They're the very best!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband likes them.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband and he likes them. They fit well and he has no complaints. This is the first Teva’s I have bought and probably will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sandals out there
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite sandals (or as we say in Hawaii, rubber slippers). I have plantar fasciitis and the arch support on these is great. The footbed is smooth and doesn't have any silly designs molded into it that leave impressions on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for exactly same sandal...but this pair doesn't fit well.
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised that Sandal was a little small seeing as I was replacing the exact same sandal. One sandal seems to want to shift sideways on me as well. Just not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick One

customer_reviews.title: Great and durable simple flip flop
customer_reviews.text: Great for garden and beach but really nothing that should be worn with an expectation of support
customer_reviews.author: Twandalu

customer_reviews.title: Definite buy
customer_reviews.text: These are easily one of the most comfortable flip flops I’ve ever owned. Sizing is accurate and the flip flops are super comfortable. I give it a strong buy
customer_reviews.author: scott ward

customer_reviews.title: Good fit!
customer_reviews.text: They were a replacement for pair and they are my dress up pair. They work fine!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Newman

customer_reviews.title: These are really comfortable, far more so than flip flops you'd typically ...
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable, far more so than flip flops you'd typically find at a big box retailer. The only complaint I have is that there is a logo tag on the heel of the top of both flip flops, and you can feel it while you're wearing them. It would have been so much better for them to put the tag on the cloth part and not the foam part. I haven't worn these for more than a few hours at a time but I have no other complaints about them.
customer_reviews.author: R. M.

customer_reviews.title: Too soft for all day.
customer_reviews.text: I like the TEVA product but these sandals are just too soft for me. I need more arch support. This sandal is well built and I will use it for around the pool but my intended purpose was an all day wear, type of sandal. Too spongy for all day wear. I listened to some of the reviews saying they wore it all day and on hikes. Not good for that in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: gregory d.

customer_reviews.title: Best flip flops in the world
customer_reviews.text: Best flops out there been down the Grand Canyon to the tops of mountains, they’re so light and comfortable have three pairs and will buy more when they wear out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: This brand never lets me down. Always comfortable, long lasting and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Adam West

customer_reviews.title: LOVE These! SUPER comfy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my bf as his sandals were so thin they were making his feet hurt. I’ve always lived teva brand and they’re the only sandals I buy. He says it’s like walking on a cloud!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great flip-flops
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit of a flip-flop snob. I usually only wear Rainbows since I'm from their headquarters hometown and know most of them. I bought these to take on a cruise since I don't like getting my rainbows wet. These sandals fit great and are very comfortable. I find myself wearing these over my rainbows some of the time. (I'm wearing them at work right now.) I will absolutely buy another pair of these when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Maunga

product_meta.title: Teva Men's Mush II Canvas Flip-Flop
product_meta.description: Teva is an authentic icon in the outdoor industry. Founded in the early 1980's by a Colorado River guide, Teva pioneered the sport-sandal category. For more than 20 years on rivers, in canyons, and across the trails of the great outdoors, athletes and enthusiasts have traveled the globe comfortably and confidently in Teva footwear. Providing positive contributions to the world in which we play is at the core of everything Teva stands for. The Teva name itself is a Hebrew word meaning "nature" and the hand logo is the Hopi symbol for "friendship" and "water." Teva supports the outdoor athletic lifestyle and remains committed to innovation in outdoor performance footwear, the platforms which carry enthusiasts beyond the offices of the day-to-day and onto the rivers, trails, and canyons of the next adventure.
feature_bullets: Classic thong sandal featuring striped canvas straps and soft footbed
